p:
To monitor internalization and endocytotic vesicle mobility, DiD-labeled ZIKV strains were applied to cells at 4 °C for 10 min to synchronize virus infection and then incubated at 37 °C
70 . ZIKV was allowed to adsorb for 1 h at 37 °C or 28 °C (C6/36), then the cells were washed with PBS twice and grown in fresh growth medium.
